TopicTitle: Steam One Day Sale on KSP -40%

Articles.Content:
So if anyone is reading this that doesn't own the game (or wants another copy), thought you'd like to know.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/220200/

(Kinda wondering if this is foreshadowing a possible patch today, though I don't think they ever said they were in experimentals yet)

EDIT: So far no sale on KSP Store or GOG.

Edited October 27, 2015 by Alshain

Devnotes mentioned "Final tweaks from QA team" so I think it's safe to assume experimentals haven't started yet. The sale is nice though, someone go take advantage of the great opportunity!
